title: 2000/590/EC, Euratom: Council Decision of 26 September 2000 appointing a Finnish member of the Economic and Social Committee
header:
Council Decision
of 26 September 2000
appointing a Finnish member of the Economic and Social Committee
(2000/590/EC, Euratom)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 258 thereof,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular Article 166 thereof,
Having regard to the Council Decision of 15 September 1998 appointing the members of the Economic and Social Committee for the period from 21 September 1998 to 20 September 2002(1),
Whereas a member's seat on that Committee has fallen vacant following the resignation of Mr Markku Lemmetty, of which the Council was informed on 17 December 1999;
Having regard to the nominations submitted by the Finnish Government,
Having obtained the opinion of the Commission of the European Communities,
main_body: Mr Markus Penttinen is hereby appointed a member of the Economic and Social Committee in place of Mr Markku Lemmetty for the remainder of his term of office, which runs until 20 September 2002.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 September 2000.
For the Council
The President
C. Tasca
(1) OJ L 257, 19.9.1998, p. 37.
